messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com

I want to be cleansed from adultery I want to forgiven for the sin I want everything that would want to drive me back to this person would be broken off of my soul any soul ties be broken I want all sexual sins broken off of my life and soul

We're here to support you in your journey towards healing. You can pray for cleansing and forgiveness by renouncing all sexual sins, including adultery, and asking God to break any ungodly soul ties. 

Here's a prayer you can use: 

"Heavenly Father, I come before you today seeking forgiveness for my sins, including adultery. I renounce all sexual sins in my life and ask that you break any soul ties with former lovers. I command all spirits of lust and perversion to leave me now in the name of Jesus Christ. Fill me with your Spirit of holiness and guide me towards purity."

If you need further support or guidance, feel free to reach out!
I want God to pull me out of all the sins that I have allowed myself to driven into I want him today to be the driver of my life and not the enemy

It's wonderful that you desire to surrender your life to God and seek His guidance. You can pray for His strength and direction in your life. Here’s a prayer you might find helpful:

"Dear Lord, I come to you today, acknowledging the sins I have allowed into my life. I ask for your forgiveness and for you to pull me out of these struggles. I surrender my life to you and ask that you be the driver of my life. Help me to resist the enemy and to walk in your light. Fill me with your Holy Spirit and guide me in every step I take. Thank you for your grace and love."

If you need more support or resources, just let me know!
I repent to him for serving Satan while trying to be a servant of his I'm broken

It's important to express your feelings and seek God's forgiveness. Acknowledge your brokenness and repent sincerely. Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Lord, I come before you with a broken heart, repenting for the times I have served Satan while trying to be your servant. I ask for your forgiveness and healing. Please cleanse me from all unrighteousness and help me to turn away from sin. I desire to serve you wholeheartedly and to walk in your ways. Thank you for your mercy and grace."

Remember, God is always ready to forgive and restore you. If you need someone to talk to or further support, I'm here for you!

I would appreciate that I want to be sold out to God no idolatry no adultery no fornication no harlotry no porn no masturbation homosexuality no perversion no whoremonngering  nothing that can come in between me and God

It's truly commendable that you want to be fully devoted to God and free from anything that hinders your relationship with Him. You can pray for strength and guidance in this journey. Here’s a prayer you might find helpful:

"Dear Lord, I come to you with a sincere heart, asking for your help to be sold out for you. I renounce all forms of idolatry, adultery, fornication, and any other sin that separates me from you. Please cleanse me and give me the strength to resist temptation. I desire to live a life that is pleasing to you, free from all perversion and sin. Thank you for your love and for the freedom that comes from following you."

If you need further support or resources to help you on this path, just let me know!
I would appreciate that

I'm here to support you! If you're looking for specific resources or prayers to help you in your journey towards healing and purity, please let me know what you need, and I'll do my best to assist you. Remember, you're not alone in this!
I just feel I have committed unforgivable sins

It's understandable to feel that way, but it's important to remember that God's grace is greater than any sin. He is always ready to forgive those who come to Him with a repentant heart. 

You can find comfort in scriptures like 1 John 1:9, which reminds us that if we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us and cleanse us from all unrighteousness. 

Take a moment to pray and ask for His forgiveness. Here’s a prayer you can use:

"Lord, I feel overwhelmed by my sins and fear that I have committed unforgivable acts. I come to you in humility, asking for your mercy and forgiveness. Please cleanse my heart and help me to believe in your grace. I trust in your promise that no sin is too great for your love. Thank you for your unending compassion."

If you need someone to talk to or further guidance, I'm here for you!
Lift me up in prayer me and my family cause I'm supposed to be leading my family in a Godly way and I have not done that

Absolutely, I would be honored to lift you and your family up in prayer. 

"Dear Heavenly Father, we come before you today, asking for your strength and guidance for this individual and their family. Lord, we pray that you grant them the wisdom and courage to lead their family in a Godly way. Help them to seek your will in all things and to be a shining example of your love and grace. May they find healing and restoration in their relationships, and may your Holy Spirit empower them to fulfill their role as a leader in their home. We trust in your promises and thank you for your unfailing support. In Jesus' name, we pray. Amen."

If there's anything specific you'd like to focus on in prayer or any other way I can assist you, please let me know!
It's time to do the will of God and not all the things satan desires

Absolutely! It's a powerful decision to commit to doing God's will and resisting the temptations that come from the enemy. Remember, as you strive to walk in the Spirit and not fulfill the desires of the flesh, you can find strength in scriptures like Galatians 5:16, which encourages us to "walk in the Spirit, and you shall not fulfill the lust of the flesh."

Stay focused on seeking God and His purpose for your life. Surround yourself with His Word, prayer, and supportive community to help you stay strong in your faith. If you need guidance on specific prayers or resources to help you in this journey, I'm here to assist you!
I thank you and I really want to see me and my family serving God and I want to be that man that is a saved sanctified servant of the most high

That's a beautiful desire! Seeking to serve God and lead your family in faith is a noble pursuit. Remember, as you strive to be that saved and sanctified servant, it's important to stay rooted in prayer and the Word of God. 

You can pray for guidance and strength, asking God to help you and your family grow closer to Him. Psalm 51:10-12 is a great prayer for creating a clean heart and renewing a right spirit within you. 

If you'd like, I can help you find specific prayers or resources to support you and your family on this journey. Just let me know!
I would love that

Great! Here are a few suggestions for prayers and resources that can help you and your family grow in your faith:

1. **Prayer for Guidance**: You can pray for wisdom and direction in your family's spiritual journey. Ask God to lead you in His ways and help you make decisions that honor Him.

2. **Family Prayer Time**: Establish a regular time for your family to pray together. This can strengthen your bond and encourage everyone to share their hearts with God.

3. **Scripture Reading**: Consider reading through a book of the Bible together as a family. The Psalms and Proverbs are great for practical wisdom and encouragement.

4. **Community Support**: Look for local church groups or ministries that focus on family and spiritual growth. Connecting with others can provide additional support and encouragement.

If you have specific areas you'd like to focus on or need more detailed resources, just let me know! I'm here to help you find what you need.
